name: postcss-global-important-plugin
description: a postcss plugin that turns elements under :global in css-module into important

scripts.dev: cd example && pnpm i && pnpm run dev && cd ../
scripts.pub: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.build: pnpm i && pnpm test:run & pnpm clean && rollup --config rollup.config.ts --configPlugin typescript
